author: Rory Sullivan, Rory Sullivan
title: 'Stop stockpiling and stay at home,' pleads coronavirus patient
description: Delia Colwill asks members of public to think of people like her
content:
A woman in hospital with coronavirus symptoms has urged people to stop stockpiling supplies and to remain at home to help contain the virus.
Delia Colwill, from Berkshire, has been in hospital since Tuesday, six days after she first showed symptoms of the di… [+1558 chars]
